title: Index of Production of Manufactures for United States
notes:
Data Are Based On Daily Average Output. Data Beginning March 1939 Exclude Carpet And Rug Manufacture; Data Beginning April 1939 Exclude Shipbuilding. Source: Data For 1919-1933: Letter From Y.S. Leong, Division Of Research And Planning, N.R.A. Data For 1934-1940: Letter From Dr. George W.Hervey, Consumers Counsel Division, A.A.A.

This NBER data series m01054 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 1 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter01.html.

NBER Indicator: m01054
